com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Class DomainPackager

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.DomainPackager

public abstract class DomainPackager
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a standard base class for extenders of the com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.domains extension point who provide a <packager /> element.

Since:
1.0
